snippet: Robert H. Benmosche, the insurance company’s chief executive, takes issue with an editorial.
abstract: Letter from AIG president and chief executive Robert H Benmosche comments on Dec 24 editorial warning of possibility that federal government will have to bail out financial institutions, as it did with AIG, if implementation of Dodd-Frank financial reform bill is not sped up.
lead_paragraph: Robert H. Benmosche, the insurance company’s chief executive, takes issue with an editorial.

keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
